description: This file defines a Kotlin class 'CartAdapter' that extends a RecyclerView ListAdapter to display and manage shopping cart items in an Android application. It includes view holder setup, diffing logic for list updates, and user interaction handlers for cart item actions like incrementing, decrementing, editing, and removing items.

classes.name: CartAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying shopping cart items, supporting item updates and interactions.

classes.name: CartAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for CartAdapter, manages views for individual cart items.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Object implementing DiffUtil.ItemCallback for efficient list updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates item layout and creates ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to views in ViewHolder and sets up interaction handlers.
